name: Vanguard Asset Management Limited
membership: Trade association memberships include: (1) European Fund and Asset Management Association (http://www.efama.org/SitePages/Home.aspx); (2) Irish Funds (http://www.irishfunds.ie/); (3) Investment Association (http://www.theinvestmentassociation.org/); (4) Investment Company Institute (http://www.ici.org/); and (5) Tax Incentivised Savings Association (http://www.tisa.uk.com/).
goal: Vanguard's core purpose: To take a stand for all investors, to treat them fairly, and to give them the best chance for investment success.
interests: Banking and financial services, Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: EU Financial services legislation and initiatives, including: (1) Capital Markets Union; (2) cross-border distribution of funds; (4) retail financial products market (costs and charges); (5) ETFs; (6) personal pension; (7) sustainable finance; (7) revised prudential framework for investment firms; (8) FinTech; (9) response to Brexit; and (10) tax reform.
